Subject: GRE & GMAT Math

Background:
The GRE (Graduate Record Examination) and GMAT (Graduate Management Admission Test) are standardized tests commonly used for admission into graduate programs. Both tests include a math section that assesses the test-takers' quantitative reasoning skills.
